CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you are well 

 

Given recent tariff announcements, many organizations may be trying to understand how best to adapt operational and strategic plans in response to rapidly shifting trade policies, which can be challenging and time consuming. 

 

Businesses that develop awareness of their exposures to potential points of disruption, take a structured approach to assess how policy changes may impact those exposures, and coherently plan against those risks can distinguish themselves from peers who may face greater constraints from the current volatile environment. Applying a risk management framework to your supply chain strategy can provide useful guidance and a way forward.

chunks.text:
Businesses that develop awareness of their exposures to potential points of disruption, take a structured approach to assess how policy changes may impact those exposures, and coherently plan against those risks can distinguish themselves from peers who may face greater constraints from the current volatile environment. Applying a risk management framework to your supply chain strategy can provide useful guidance and a way forward. 

 

Our latest insight, “Shifting trade policies: A framework for understanding and managing uncertainty, <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/YoDpCXkNOSDJPPNi6f1cWzFeL?domain=marsh.com> ” provides a risk management framework that can help you navigate today’s complex risk landscape while establishing a process to address emerging risks. 

 

Using solutions like Marsh McLennan’s Sentrisk <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/NTkBCYlOPUp8WWZsGh0cxzeuW?domain=marshmclennan.com>  to identify your risks can help you take a proactive step to be better prepared. 

 

Marsh and our Sentrisk teams are dedicated to helping you navigate these issues and support your supply chain risk management.

 

 

Here’s how Sentrisk can help Our Clients  navigate these turbulent times:

chunks.text:
Marsh and our Sentrisk teams are dedicated to helping you navigate these issues and support your supply chain risk management.

 

 

Here’s how Sentrisk can help Our Clients  navigate these turbulent times:

 

1.	Tariff Impact Quantification: Clients can conduct a thorough inventory of their direct and indirect exposures to tariffs, allowing them to understand their vulnerabilities and prepare accordingly.
2.	Scenario Analysis: By testing identified risks, clients can prepare for various outcomes, ensuring they are equipped to respond effectively to changing trade conditions.
3.	Risk Mitigation Strategies: Sentrisk enables the development of robust governance frameworks to manage tariff changes, helping clients mitigate potential impacts on their operations and profitability.

 

We have recently published another great piece on the Marsh website focussed on managing tariff uncertainty <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mX2yCZmPQt8GqqRHKi4cBbZ2t?domain=marsh.com>  ; 

 

Kind regards,

 

 

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII -ANZIIF

Cert. ISO 31000 Enterprise Risk Management

Chartered Insurance Practitioner 

Vice President -Business Development Leader
